tool.name: GEMINI @BINARY@
tool.description: Tag somatic mutations in a GEMINI database
tool.command:
cp '$infile' '$outfile' &&
gemini @BINARY@
#if float($min_depth) >= 0: --min-depth $min_depth #end if
#if float($min_quality) >= 0: --min-qual $min_quality #end if
#if float($min_somatic_score) >= 0: --min-somatic-score $min_somatic_score #end if
#if float($max_norm_alt_freq) >= 0: --max-norm-alt-freq $max_norm_alt_freq #end if
#if int($max_norm_alt_count) >= 0: --max-norm-alt-count $max_norm_alt_count #end if
#if int($min_norm_depth) >= 0: --min-norm-depth $min_norm_depth #end if
#if float($min_tumor_alt_freq) >= 0: --min-tumor-alt-freq $min_tumor_alt_freq #end if
#if int($min_tumor_alt_count) >= 0: --min-tumor-alt-count $min_tumor_alt_count #end if
#if int($min_tumor_depth) >= 0: --min-tumor-depth $min_tumor_depth #end if
#if str($chrom).strip(): --chrom '$chrom' #end if '$outfile'

param.name: min_depth
param.label: The min combined depth for tumor + normal

param.name: max_norm_alt_freq
param.label: The max frequency of the alternative allele in the normal sample

param.name: max_norm_alt_count
param.label: The max count of the alternative allele in the normal sample

param.name: min_norm_depth
param.label: The minimum depth allowed in the normal sample to believe somatic

param.name: min_tumor_alt_freq
param.label: The minimum frequency of the alternative allele in the tumor sample

param.name: min_tumor_alt_count
param.label: The minimum count of the alternative allele in the tumor sample

param.name: min_tumor_depth
param.label: The minimum depth allowed in the tumor sample to believe somatic

param.name: chrom
param.label: A specific chromosome on which to tag somatic mutations

tool.help:
**What it does**
Gemini set_somatic sets the flag "is_somatic" by comparing tumor/normal pairs in an already loaded Gemini database.
